summary:
Francisco is a visionary entrepreneur with a passion for innovation and a strong scientific background. He is a firm believer that the next generation of technologies will be inspired by nature and that sustainable solutions can bring immense economic benefits. With a focus on creating a more sustainable future, Francisco has extensive experience in developing new technologies for the recovery and separation of valuable metals from waste.

Throughout his career, Francisco has worked on a variety of innovative water treatment technology projects in France, Ecuador, Germany, and Spain. He has gained recognition for his innovative approach to solving complex environmental problems and his ability to bring together diverse teams of experts to achieve common goals.

Today, Francisco is at the forefront of sustainable innovation as a co-founder of Byewaste. This community-driven solution is designed to increase the separation and recycling of household waste, with a focus on materials that are harmful to the environment when mixed but can be recovered as raw materials with proper separation. Byewaste's approach aligns perfectly with the high standards for circular economy and smart cities set by the EU, making it a unique and valuable contribution to the sustainability movement.
